snippet: The Italian soprano Anna Caterina Antonacci, beloved in Europe but mostly absent from the United States, will appear in New York in a recital tour.
abstract: Italian soprano Anna Caterina Antonacci, beloved in Europe but mostly absent from the United States, will appear in New York in a recital tour at Alice Tully Hall; Antonacci has spent eight years overhauling her opera career, renewing her technique, shifting her repertory, changing her management and even switching her voice type.
lead_paragraph: The Italian soprano Anna Caterina Antonacci, beloved in Europe but mostly absent from the United States, will appear in New York in a recital tour.

headline.main: A Career That Moves in Mysterious Ways
headline.print_headline: A Career That Moves In Mysterious Ways
